item.title: By: vincent
item.dc:creator: vincent
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://grandmighty.github.io/grandmighty/2015/10/aim-mxg-dashlogger/#comment-159495">william</a>.
have you been able to make the fuel level gauge work with the mxg?
item.content:encoded:
In reply to william.

have you been able to make the fuel level gauge work with the mxg?

item.title: By: william
item.dc:creator: william
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://grandmighty.github.io/grandmighty/2015/10/aim-mxg-dashlogger/#comment-158299">Eric</a>.
Sweet man good info, I'm trying to add aftermarket lights to my cluster after molding a tablet into it, thanks
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Eric.

Sweet man good info, I’m trying to add aftermarket lights to my cluster after molding a tablet into it, thanks

item.title: By: Eric
item.dc:creator: Eric
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://grandmighty.github.io/grandmighty/2015/10/aim-mxg-dashlogger/#comment-156211">william</a>.
Yes they will. The blinking of the cluster lights is only tied into the relay near the CPU #2, opposite of the circuit that goes to the lights themselves. I tapped into the same circuit as the original cluster lights and the AiM is internally fused and was able to translate the voltage.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to william.

Yes they will. The blinking of the cluster lights is only tied into the relay near the CPU #2, opposite of the circuit that goes to the lights themselves. I tapped into the same circuit as the original cluster lights and the AiM is internally fused and was able to translate the voltage.

item.title: By: william
item.dc:creator: william
item.description: What did you do for turn signals? Are they part of the circuit? As in, will the exterior markers still blink without the cluster lights plugged in.
item.content:encoded: What did you do for turn signals? Are they part of the circuit? As in, will the exterior markers still blink without the cluster lights plugged in.

item.title: By: Eric
item.dc:creator: Eric
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://grandmighty.github.io/grandmighty/2015/10/aim-mxg-dashlogger/#comment-147172">Daniel</a>.
That was part of the Pioneer Double DIN install kit. Do a search for it and you should be able to find it.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Daniel.

That was part of the Pioneer Double DIN install kit. Do a search for it and you should be able to find it.

item.title: By: Daniel
item.dc:creator: Daniel
item.description: Love the look of the interior! The MXG really updates things. Can I ask where you got the dual din stereo bezel? It looks nicer than some others I've seen..
item.content:encoded: Love the look of the interior! The MXG really updates things. Can I ask where you got the dual din stereo bezel? It looks nicer than some others I’ve seen..
